version_description:
- Add function of automatic photo backup
- Support online video playback
- Optimize file management capability and support fuzzy search. 
- Add web address prompt
- Support mobile local library/file saving

1. Mailbox can be registered as an account, and secured login protection is offered
2. The nickname and profile picture of a personal account can be modified
3. Support for Spanish language added
4. Bugs were fixed and product experience were optimized

1. Email sharing method is added to enable you sharing permanent effective links to your friends, family, colleagues
2. Manage and share your files, and in the same time ensure user privacy and data security
3. Smart classification of photos, sort and categorize your photos
4. File offline use function. This enables you viewing stored files without access to Internet

1. Email sharing method is added to enable you sharing permanent effective links to your friends, family, colleagues
2. Manage and share your files, and in the same time ensure user privacy and data security
3. Smart classification of photos, sort and categorize your photos
4. File offline use function. This enables you viewing stored files without access to Internet

1. Select video clarity. Video clarity can be switched at will.
2. User feedback zone. Faster feedback & resolution.
3. Share by email. The backups can be shared by email at one click.
4. With some bugs fixed and experience optimized.

Dubox has officially been renamed as TeraBox
Dubox has officially been renamed as TeraBox
Dubox has officially been renamed as TeraBox

TeraBox v2.0 version-new upgrade of architecture
1. New homepage smart push (feed stream): On the homepage, you can view recently viewed pictures & video records, and recently uploaded file records, etc.
2. Adjust the position of the personal center
3. Performance fixes

TeraBox v2.0 version-new upgrade of architecture

2. Adjust the position of the personal center
3. Performance fixes

TeraBox v2.2- comprehensively upgraded functions

3. TeraBox Premium privilege upgrade
4. Feedback Center [FAQ List] optimization

TeraBox v2.3.0:
1. Cloud decompression: supports decompression and preview of package within 12GB
2. Document preview capability: online preview of multiple file formats (word, pdf, Excel, txt, etc.) is supported
3. Optimized login logic: the last login method is recorded to facilitate users to log in quickly

TeraBox v2.4.5 version
1.Homepage display optimization
2.Homepage guide to new users
3.QR code scanning is added and login at web side by scanning QR code is supported
4.Login on shared page outside the app is supported
5.Minor bug fixes and enhancements
6.One-click sharing to social media function is added

TeraBox v2.6.5

4. Added a subtitle function for online video playback
5. Optimized the card style on the home screen

TeraBox v2.10.0
1.Bonus Center has been upgraded. Get more cloud space by inviting your friends to try TeraBox.
2.A [Share] tab was added for sharing anytime, anywhere.
3.The mobile app is compatible with the TeraBox website. The new TeraBox website is now compatible with mobile phones and supports 11 languages.
4.A known bug was fixed to improve the login experience.
